execution_plan.description: Find customer email+country groups in the EU database that have more than one account (COUNT(id) > 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.email AS s1__email, customers.country AS s1__country, COUNT(customers.id) AS s1__count FROM customers GROUP BY customers.email, customers.country HAVING COUNT(customers.id) > 1;

execution_plan.description: Find customer email+country groups in the US database that have more than one account (COUNT(id) > 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.email AS s2__email, customers.country AS s2__country, COUNT(customers.id) AS s2__count FROM customers GROUP BY customers.email, customers.country HAVING COUNT(customers.id) > 1;
